text: Sint Kruis is a village in the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located about 4 km east of Aardenburg, in the municipality of Sluis. Sint Kruis was a separate municipality until 1941, when it was merged with Aardenburg. ==References== ==External links== *Map of the former municipality in 1868 Category:Populated places in Zeeland Category:Former municipalities of Zeeland Category:Sluis
title: Sint Kruis
